job_tasks.phrase: generatieve AI services implementeren binnen Mendix apps
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of integrating AI services, specifically generative AI, into an application platform (Mendix apps), aligning with building and deploying software features.

The phrase 'sleutelen aan ML modellen' (tinkering with ML models) directly refers to the process of developing or working on machine learning models, fitting the definition of model development and experimentation.
Exploring new possibilities of AI implies research and experimentation with AI techniques, which falls under model development and exploration of AI capabilities.
Developing smart solutions indicates understanding needs and translating them into technical solutions, aligning with business understanding and strategy.

profile.rationale: The job requires implementing generative AI services within applications (Macro-Category A) and also involves working on ML models and exploring AI possibilities (Macro-Category B). The explicit mention of 'generatieve AI services' points towards a focus on GenAI. This combination of software integration and AI model work, with a GenAI emphasis, fits the Core GenAI Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities involving both software integration and AI model work, with a specific mention of generative AI. The language is direct, although the 'ML modellen' could be more specific regarding their type. The Mendix platform is also clearly identified.
